4148  if (!it->second->IsValid() && it->second->GetAncestor(nHeight) == pindex) {
4149  it->second->nStatus &= ~BLOCK_FAILED_MASK;
4150  setDirtyBlockIndex.insert(it->second);
4151  if (it->second->IsValid(BLOCK_VALID_TRANSACTIONS) && it->second->nChainTx && setBlockIndexCandidates.value_comp()(chainActive.Tip(), it->second)) {
4152  setBlockIndexCandidates.insert(it->second);
4153  }
4154  if (it->second == pindexBestInvalid) {
4155  // Reset invalid block marker if it was pointing to one of those.
4156  pindexBestInvalid = NULL;
4157  }
4158  }
4159  it++;
4160  }
4161 
4162  // Remove the invalidity flag from all ancestors too.
4163  while (pindex != NULL) {
4164  if (pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_FAILED_MASK) {
4165  pindex->nStatus &= ~BLOCK_FAILED_MASK;
4166  setDirtyBlockIndex.insert(pindex);
4167  }
4168  pindex = pindex->pprev;
4169  }
4170  return true;
4171 }
4172 
4173 CBlockIndex* AddToBlockIndex(const CBlock& block)
4174 {
4175  // Check for duplicate
4176  uint256 hash = block.GetHash();
4177  BlockMap::iterator it = mapBlockIndex.find(hash);
4178  if (it != mapBlockIndex.end())
4179  return it->second;
4180 
4181  // Construct new block index object
4182  CBlockIndex* pindexNew = new CBlockIndex(block);
4183  assert(pindexNew);
4184  // We assign the sequence id to blocks only when the full data is available,
4185  // to avoid miners withholding blocks but broadcasting headers, to get a
4186  // competitive advantage.
4187  pindexNew->nSequenceId = 0;
4188  BlockMap::iterator mi = mapBlockIndex.insert(make_pair(hash, pindexNew)).first;
4189 
4190  //mark as PoS seen
4191  if (pindexNew->IsProofOfStake())
4192  setStakeSeen.insert(make_pair(pindexNew->prevoutStake, pindexNew->nStakeTime));
4193 
4194  pindexNew->phashBlock = &((*mi).first);
4195  BlockMap::iterator miPrev = mapBlockIndex.find(block.hashPrevBlock);
4196  if (miPrev != mapBlockIndex.end()) {
4197  pindexNew->pprev = (*miPrev).second;
4198  pindexNew->nHeight = pindexNew->pprev->nHeight + 1;
4199  pindexNew->BuildSkip();
4200 
4201  //update previous block pointer
4202  pindexNew->pprev->pnext = pindexNew;
4203 
4204  // ppcoin: compute chain trust score
4205  pindexNew->bnChainTrust = (pindexNew->pprev ? pindexNew->pprev->bnChainTrust : 0) + pindexNew->GetBlockTrust();
4206 
4207  // ppcoin: compute stake entropy bit for stake modifier
4208  if (!pindexNew->SetStakeEntropyBit(pindexNew->GetStakeEntropyBit()))
4209  LogPrintf("AddToBlockIndex() : SetStakeEntropyBit() failed \n");
4210 
4211  // ppcoin: record proof-of-stake hash value
4212  if (pindexNew->IsProofOfStake()) {
4213  if (!mapProofOfStake.count(hash))
4214  LogPrintf("AddToBlockIndex() : hashProofOfStake not found in map \n");
4215  pindexNew->hashProofOfStake = mapProofOfStake[hash];
4216  }
4217 
4218  // ppcoin: compute stake modifier
4219  uint64_t nStakeModifier = 0;
4220  bool fGeneratedStakeModifier = false;
4221  if (!ComputeNextStakeModifier(pindexNew->pprev, nStakeModifier, fGeneratedStakeModifier))
4222  LogPrintf("AddToBlockIndex() : ComputeNextStakeModifier() failed \n");
4223  pindexNew->SetStakeModifier(nStakeModifier, fGeneratedStakeModifier);
4224  pindexNew->nStakeModifierChecksum = GetStakeModifierChecksum(pindexNew);
4225  if (!CheckStakeModifierCheckpoints(pindexNew->nHeight, pindexNew->nStakeModifierChecksum))
4226  LogPrintf("AddToBlockIndex() : Rejected by stake modifier checkpoint height=%d, modifier=%s \n", pindexNew->nHeight, boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(nStakeModifier));
4227  }
4228  pindexNew->nChainWork = (pindexNew->pprev ? pindexNew->pprev->nChainWork : 0) + GetBlockProof(*pindexNew);
4229  pindexNew->RaiseValidity(BLOCK_VALID_TREE);
4230  if (pindexBestHeader == NULL || pindexBestHeader->nChainWork < pindexNew->nChainWork)
4231  pindexBestHeader = pindexNew;
4232 
4233  //update previous block pointer
4234  if (pindexNew->nHeight)
4235  pindexNew->pprev->pnext = pindexNew;
4236 
4237  setDirtyBlockIndex.insert(pindexNew);
4238 
4239  return pindexNew;
4240 }
4241 
4243 bool ReceivedBlockTransactions(const CBlock& block, CValidationState& state, CBlockIndex* pindexNew, const CDiskBlockPos& pos)
4244 {
4245  if (block.IsProofOfStake())
4246  pindexNew->SetProofOfStake();
4247  pindexNew->nTx = block.vtx.size();
4248  pindexNew->nChainTx = 0;
4249  pindexNew->nFile = pos.nFile;
4250  pindexNew->nDataPos = pos.nPos;
4251  pindexNew->nUndoPos = 0;
4252  pindexNew->nStatus |= BLOCK_HAVE_DATA;
4253  pindexNew->RaiseValidity(BLOCK_VALID_TRANSACTIONS);
4254  setDirtyBlockIndex.insert(pindexNew);
4255 
4256  if (pindexNew->pprev == NULL || pindexNew->pprev->nChainTx) {
4257  // If pindexNew is the genesis block or all parents are BLOCK_VALID_TRANSACTIONS.
4258  deque<CBlockIndex*> queue;
4259  queue.push_back(pindexNew);
4260 
4261  // Recursively process any descendant blocks that now may be eligible to be connected.
4262  while (!queue.empty()) {
4263  CBlockIndex* pindex = queue.front();
4264  queue.pop_front();
4265  pindex->nChainTx = (pindex->pprev ? pindex->pprev->nChainTx : 0) + pindex->nTx;
4266  {
4267  LOCK(cs_nBlockSequenceId);
4268  pindex->nSequenceId = nBlockSequenceId++;
4269  }
4270  if (chainActive.Tip() == NULL || !setBlockIndexCandidates.value_comp()(pindex, chainActive.Tip())) {
4271  setBlockIndexCandidates.insert(pindex);
4272  }
4273  std::pair<std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator, std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator> range = mapBlocksUnlinked.equal_range(pindex);
4274  while (range.first != range.second) {
4275  std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator it = range.first;
4276  queue.push_back(it->second);
4277  range.first++;
4278  mapBlocksUnlinked.erase(it);
4279  }
4280  }
4281  } else {
4282  if (pindexNew->pprev && pindexNew->pprev->IsValid(BLOCK_VALID_TREE)) {
4283  mapBlocksUnlinked.insert(std::make_pair(pindexNew->pprev, pindexNew));
4284  }
4285  }
4286 
4287  return true;
4288 }
4289 
4290 bool FindBlockPos(CValidationState& state, CDiskBlockPos& pos, unsigned int nAddSize, unsigned int nHeight, uint64_t nTime, bool fKnown = false)
4291 {
4292  LOCK(cs_LastBlockFile);
4293 
4294  unsigned int nFile = fKnown ? pos.nFile : nLastBlockFile;
4295  if (vinfoBlockFile.size() <= nFile) {
4296  vinfoBlockFile.resize(nFile + 1);
4297  }
4298 
4299  if (!fKnown) {
4300  while (vinfoBlockFile[nFile].nSize + nAddSize >= MAX_BLOCKFILE_SIZE) {
4301  LogPrintf("Leaving block file %i: %s\n", nFile, vinfoBlockFile[nFile].ToString());
4302  FlushBlockFile(true);
4303  nFile++;
4304  if (vinfoBlockFile.size() <= nFile) {
4305  vinfoBlockFile.resize(nFile + 1);
4306  }
4307  }
4308  pos.nFile = nFile;
4309  pos.nPos = vinfoBlockFile[nFile].nSize;
4310  }
4311 
4312  nLastBlockFile = nFile;
4313  vinfoBlockFile[nFile].AddBlock(nHeight, nTime);
4314  if (fKnown)
4315  vinfoBlockFile[nFile].nSize = std::max(pos.nPos + nAddSize, vinfoBlockFile[nFile].nSize);
4316  else
4317  vinfoBlockFile[nFile].nSize += nAddSize;
4318 
4319  if (!fKnown) {
4320  unsigned int nOldChunks = (pos.nPos + BLOCKFILE_CHUNK_SIZE - 1) / BLOCKFILE_CHUNK_SIZE;
4321  unsigned int nNewChunks = (vinfoBlockFile[nFile].nSize + BLOCKFILE_CHUNK_SIZE - 1) / BLOCKFILE_CHUNK_SIZE;
4322  if (nNewChunks > nOldChunks) {
4323  if (CheckDiskSpace(nNewChunks * BLOCKFILE_CHUNK_SIZE - pos.nPos)) {
4324  FILE* file = OpenBlockFile(pos);
4325  if (file) {
4326  LogPrintf("Pre-allocating up to position 0x%x in blk%05u.dat\n", nNewChunks * BLOCKFILE_CHUNK_SIZE, pos.nFile);
4327  AllocateFileRange(file, pos.nPos, nNewChunks * BLOCKFILE_CHUNK_SIZE - pos.nPos);
4328  fclose(file);
4329  }
4330  } else
4331  return state.Error("out of disk space");
4332  }
4333  }
4334 
4335  setDirtyFileInfo.insert(nFile);
4336  return true;
4337 }
4338 
4339 bool FindUndoPos(CValidationState& state, int nFile, CDiskBlockPos& pos, unsigned int nAddSize)
4340 {
4341  pos.nFile = nFile;
4342 
4343  LOCK(cs_LastBlockFile);
4344 
4345  unsigned int nNewSize;
4346  pos.nPos = vinfoBlockFile[nFile].nUndoSize;
4347  nNewSize = vinfoBlockFile[nFile].nUndoSize += nAddSize;
4348  setDirtyFileInfo.insert(nFile);
4349 
4350  unsigned int nOldChunks = (pos.nPos + UNDOFILE_CHUNK_SIZE - 1) / UNDOFILE_CHUNK_SIZE;
4351  unsigned int nNewChunks = (nNewSize + UNDOFILE_CHUNK_SIZE - 1) / UNDOFILE_CHUNK_SIZE;
4352  if (nNewChunks > nOldChunks) {
4353  if (CheckDiskSpace(nNewChunks * UNDOFILE_CHUNK_SIZE - pos.nPos)) {
4354  FILE* file = OpenUndoFile(pos);
4355  if (file) {
4356  LogPrintf("Pre-allocating up to position 0x%x in rev%05u.dat\n", nNewChunks * UNDOFILE_CHUNK_SIZE, pos.nFile);
4357  AllocateFileRange(file, pos.nPos, nNewChunks * UNDOFILE_CHUNK_SIZE - pos.nPos);
4358  fclose(file);
4359  }
4360  } else
4361  return state.Error("out of disk space");
4362  }
4363 
4364  return true;
4365 }
4366 
4367 bool CheckBlockHeader(const CBlockHeader& block, CValidationState& state, bool fCheckPOW)
4368 {
4369  // Check proof of work matches claimed amount
4370  if (fCheckPOW && !CheckProofOfWork(block.GetHash(), block.nBits))
4371  return state.DoS(50, error("CheckBlockHeader() : proof of work failed"),
4372  REJECT_INVALID, "high-hash");
4373 
4374  // Version 4 header must be used after Params().Zerocoin_StartHeight(). And never before.
4375  /*if (block.GetBlockTime() > Params().Zerocoin_StartTime()) {
4376  if(block.nVersion < Params().Zerocoin_HeaderVersion())
4377  return state.DoS(50, error("CheckBlockHeader() : block version must be above 4 after ZerocoinStartHeight"),
4378  REJECT_INVALID, "block-version");
4379  } else {
4380  if (block.nVersion >= Params().Zerocoin_HeaderVersion())
4381  return state.DoS(50, error("CheckBlockHeader() : block version must be below 4 before ZerocoinStartHeight"),
4382  REJECT_INVALID, "block-version");
4383  }*/
4384 
4385  return true;
4386 }
4387 
4388 bool CheckBlock(const CBlock& block, CValidationState& state, bool fCheckPOW, bool fCheckMerkleRoot, bool fCheckSig)
4389 {
4390  // These are checks that are independent of context.
4391 
4392  // Check that the header is valid (particularly PoW). This is mostly
4393  // redundant with the call in AcceptBlockHeader.
4394  if (!CheckBlockHeader(block, state, block.IsProofOfWork()))
4395  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : CheckBlockHeader failed"),
4396  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-header", true);
4397 
4398  // Check timestamp
4399  LogPrint("debug", "%s: block=%s is proof of stake=%d\n", __func__, block.GetHash().ToString().c_str(), block.IsProofOfStake());
4400  if (block.GetBlockTime() > GetAdjustedTime() + (block.IsProofOfStake() ? 180 : 7200)) // 3 minute future drift for PoS
4401  return state.Invalid(error("CheckBlock() : block timestamp too far in the future"),
4402  REJECT_INVALID, "time-too-new");
4403 
4404  // Check the merkle root.
4405  if (fCheckMerkleRoot) {
4406  bool mutated;
4407  uint256 hashMerkleRoot2 = block.BuildMerkleTree(&mutated);
4408  if (block.hashMerkleRoot != hashMerkleRoot2)
4409  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : hashMerkleRoot mismatch"),
4410  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-txnmrklroot", true);
4411 
4412  // Check for merkle tree malleability (CVE-2012-2459): repeating sequences
4413  // of transactions in a block without affecting the merkle root of a block,
4414  // while still invalidating it.
4415  if (mutated)
4416  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : duplicate transaction"),
4417  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-txns-duplicate", true);
4418  }
4419 
4420  // All potential-corruption validation must be done before we do any
4421  // transaction validation, as otherwise we may mark the header as invalid
4422  // because we receive the wrong transactions for it.
4423 
4424  // Size limits
4425  unsigned int nMaxBlockSize = MAX_BLOCK_SIZE_CURRENT;
4426  if (block.vtx.empty() || block.vtx.size() > nMaxBlockSize || ::GetSerializeSize(block, SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION) > nMaxBlockSize)
4427  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : size limits failed"),
4428  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-blk-length");
4429 
4430  // First transaction must be coinbase, the rest must not be
4431  if (block.vtx.empty() || !block.vtx[0].IsCoinBase())
4432  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : first tx is not coinbase"),
4433  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-cb-missing");
4434  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < block.vtx.size(); i++)
4435  if (block.vtx[i].IsCoinBase())
4436  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : more than one coinbase"),
4437  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-cb-multiple");
4438 
4439  if (block.IsProofOfStake()) {
4440  // Coinbase output should be empty if proof-of-stake block
4441  if (block.vtx[0].vout.size() != 1 || !block.vtx[0].vout[0].IsEmpty())
4442  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : coinbase output not empty for proof-of-stake block"));
4443 
4444  // Second transaction must be coinstake, the rest must not be
4445  if (block.vtx.empty() || !block.vtx[1].IsCoinStake())
4446  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : second tx is not coinstake"));
4447  for (unsigned int i = 2; i < block.vtx.size(); i++)
4448  if (block.vtx[i].IsCoinStake())
4449  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : more than one coinstake"));
4450  }
4451 
4452  // ----------- swiftTX transaction scanning -----------
4453  if (IsSporkActive(SPORK_3_SWIFTTX_BLOCK_FILTERING)) {
4454  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTransaction& tx, block.vtx) {
4455  if (!tx.IsCoinBase()) {
4456  //only reject blocks when it's based on complete consensus
4457  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTxIn& in, tx.vin) {
4458  if (mapLockedInputs.count(in.prevout)) {
4459  if (mapLockedInputs[in.prevout] != tx.GetHash()) {
4460  mapRejectedBlocks.insert(make_pair(block.GetHash(), GetTime()));
4461  LogPrintf("CheckBlock() : found conflicting transaction with transaction lock %s %s\n", mapLockedInputs[in.prevout].ToString(), tx.GetHash().ToString());
4462  return state.DoS(0, error("CheckBlock() : found conflicting transaction with transaction lock"),
4463  REJECT_INVALID, "conflicting-tx-ix");
4464  }
4465  }
4466  }
4467  }
4468  }
4469  } else {
4470  LogPrintf("CheckBlock() : skipping transaction locking checks\n");
4471  }
4472 
4473  // masternode payments / budgets
4474  /*CBlockIndex* pindexPrev = chainActive.Tip();
4475  int nHeight = 0;
4476  if (pindexPrev != NULL) {
4477  if (pindexPrev->GetBlockHash() == block.hashPrevBlock) {
4478  nHeight = pindexPrev->nHeight + 1;
4479  } else { //out of order
4480  BlockMap::iterator mi = mapBlockIndex.find(block.hashPrevBlock);
4481  if (mi != mapBlockIndex.end() && (*mi).second)
4482  nHeight = (*mi).second->nHeight + 1;
4483  }
4484 
4485  // DIVI
4486  // It is entierly possible that we don't have enough data and this could fail
4487  // (i.e. the block could indeed be valid). Store the block for later consideration
4488  // but issue an initial reject message.
4489  // The case also exists that the sending peer could not have enough data to see
4490  // that this block is invalid, so don't issue an outright ban.
4491  if (nHeight != 0 && !IsInitialBlockDownload()) {
4492  if (!IsBlockPayeeValid(block, nHeight)) {
4493  mapRejectedBlocks.insert(make_pair(block.GetHash(), GetTime()));
4494  return state.DoS(0, error("CheckBlock() : Couldn't find masternode/budget payment"),
4495  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-cb-payee");
4496  }
4497  } else {
4498  if (fDebug)
4499  LogPrintf("CheckBlock(): Masternode payment check skipped on sync - skipping IsBlockPayeeValid()\n");
4500  }
4501  }
4502  */
4503  // Check transactions
4504  bool fZerocoinActive = block.GetBlockTime() > Params().Zerocoin_StartTime();
4505  vector<CBigNum> vBlockSerials;
4506  for (const CTransaction& tx : block.vtx) {
4507  if (!CheckTransaction(tx, fZerocoinActive, chainActive.Height() + 1 >= Params().Zerocoin_Block_EnforceSerialRange(), state))
4508  return error("CheckBlock() : CheckTransaction failed");
4509 
4510  // double check that there are no double spent zDiv spends in this block
4511  if (tx.IsZerocoinSpend()) {
4512  for (const CTxIn txIn : tx.vin) {
4513  if (txIn.scriptSig.IsZerocoinSpend()) {
4514  libzerocoin::CoinSpend spend = TxInToZerocoinSpend(txIn);
4515  if (count(vBlockSerials.begin(), vBlockSerials.end(), spend.getCoinSerialNumber()))
4516  return state.DoS(100, error("%s : Double spending of zDiv serial %s in block\n Block: %s",
4517  __func__, spend.getCoinSerialNumber().GetHex(), block.ToString()));
4518  vBlockSerials.emplace_back(spend.getCoinSerialNumber());
4519  }
4520  }
4521  }
4522  }
4523 
4524 
4525  unsigned int nSigOps = 0;
4526  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTransaction& tx, block.vtx) {
4527  nSigOps += GetLegacySigOpCount(tx);
4528  }
4529  unsigned int nMaxBlockSigOps = fZerocoinActive ? MAX_BLOCK_SIGOPS_CURRENT : MAX_BLOCK_SIGOPS_LEGACY;
4530  if (nSigOps > nMaxBlockSigOps)
4531  return state.DoS(100, error("CheckBlock() : out-of-bounds SigOpCount"),
4532  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-blk-sigops", true);
4533 
4534  return true;
4535 }
4536 
4537 bool CheckWork(const CBlock block, CBlockIndex* const pindexPrev)
4538 {
4539  if (pindexPrev == NULL)
4540  return error("%s : null pindexPrev for block %s", __func__, block.GetHash().ToString().c_str());
4541 
4542  unsigned int nBitsRequired = GetNextWorkRequired(pindexPrev, &block);
4543 
4544  if (block.IsProofOfWork() && (pindexPrev->nHeight + 1 <= 68589)) {
4545  double n1 = ConvertBitsToDouble(block.nBits);
4546  double n2 = ConvertBitsToDouble(nBitsRequired);
4547 
4548  if (abs(n1 - n2) > n1 * 0.5)
4549  return error("%s : incorrect proof of work (DGW pre-fork) - %f %f %f at %d", __func__, abs(n1 - n2), n1, n2, pindexPrev->nHeight + 1);
4550 
4551  return true;
4552  }
4553 
4554  if (block.nBits != nBitsRequired)
4555  return error("%s : incorrect proof of work at %d", __func__, pindexPrev->nHeight + 1);
4556 
4557  if (block.IsProofOfStake()) {
4558  uint256 hashProofOfStake;
4559  uint256 hash = block.GetHash();
4560 
4561  if(!CheckProofOfStake(block, hashProofOfStake)) {
4562  LogPrintf("WARNING: ProcessBlock(): check proof-of-stake failed for block %s\n", hash.ToString().c_str());
4563  return false;
4564  }
4565  if(!mapProofOfStake.count(hash)) // add to mapProofOfStake
4566  mapProofOfStake.insert(make_pair(hash, hashProofOfStake));
4567  }
4568 
4569  return true;
4570 }
4571 
4572 bool ContextualCheckBlockHeader(const CBlockHeader& block, CValidationState& state, CBlockIndex* const pindexPrev)
4573 {
4574  uint256 hash = block.GetHash();
4575 
4576  if (hash == Params().HashGenesisBlock())
4577  return true;
4578 
4579  assert(pindexPrev);
4580 
4581  int nHeight = pindexPrev->nHeight + 1;
4582 
4583  //If this is a reorg, check that it is not too deep
4584  int nMaxReorgDepth = GetArg("-maxreorg", Params().MaxReorganizationDepth());
4585  if (chainActive.Height() - nHeight >= nMaxReorgDepth)
4586  return state.DoS(1, error("%s: forked chain older than max reorganization depth (height %d)", __func__, nHeight));
4587 
4588  // Check timestamp against prev
4589  if (block.GetBlockTime() <= pindexPrev->GetMedianTimePast()) {
4590  LogPrintf("Block time = %d , GetMedianTimePast = %d \n", block.GetBlockTime(), pindexPrev->GetMedianTimePast());
4591  return state.Invalid(error("%s : block's timestamp is too early", __func__),
4592  REJECT_INVALID, "time-too-old");
4593  }
4594 
4595  // Check that the block chain matches the known block chain up to a checkpoint
4596  if (!Checkpoints::CheckBlock(nHeight, hash))
4597  return state.DoS(100, error("%s : rejected by checkpoint lock-in at %d", __func__, nHeight),
4598  REJECT_CHECKPOINT, "checkpoint mismatch");
4599 
4600  // Don't accept any forks from the main chain prior to last checkpoint
4601  CBlockIndex* pcheckpoint = Checkpoints::GetLastCheckpoint();
4602  if (pcheckpoint && nHeight < pcheckpoint->nHeight)
4603  return state.DoS(0, error("%s : forked chain older than last checkpoint (height %d)", __func__, nHeight));
4604 
4605  // Reject block.nVersion=1 blocks when 95% (75% on testnet) of the network has upgraded:
4606  if (block.nVersion < 2 &&
4607  CBlockIndex::IsSuperMajority(2, pindexPrev, Params().RejectBlockOutdatedMajority())) {
4608  return state.Invalid(error("%s : rejected nVersion=1 block", __func__),
4609  REJECT_OBSOLETE, "bad-version");
4610  }
4611 
4612  // Reject block.nVersion=2 blocks when 95% (75% on testnet) of the network has upgraded:
4613  if (block.nVersion < 3 && CBlockIndex::IsSuperMajority(3, pindexPrev, Params().RejectBlockOutdatedMajority())) {
4614  return state.Invalid(error("%s : rejected nVersion=2 block", __func__),
4615  REJECT_OBSOLETE, "bad-version");
4616  }
4617 
4618  return true;
4619 }
4620 
4621 bool IsBlockHashInChain(const uint256& hashBlock)
4622 {
4623  if (hashBlock == 0 || !mapBlockIndex.count(hashBlock))
4624  return false;
4625 
4626  return chainActive.Contains(mapBlockIndex[hashBlock]);
4627 }
4628 
4629 bool IsTransactionInChain(uint256 txId, int& nHeightTx)
4630 {
4631  uint256 hashBlock;
4632  CTransaction tx;
4633  GetTransaction(txId, tx, hashBlock, true);
4634  if (!IsBlockHashInChain(hashBlock))
4635  return false;
4636 
4637  nHeightTx = mapBlockIndex.at(hashBlock)->nHeight;
4638  return true;
4639 }
4640 
4641 bool ContextualCheckBlock(const CBlock& block, CValidationState& state, CBlockIndex* const pindexPrev)
4642 {
4643  const int nHeight = pindexPrev == NULL ? 0 : pindexPrev->nHeight + 1;
4644 
4645  // Check that all transactions are finalized
4646  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTransaction& tx, block.vtx)
4647  if (!IsFinalTx(tx, nHeight, block.GetBlockTime())) {
4648  return state.DoS(10, error("%s : contains a non-final transaction", __func__), REJECT_INVALID, "bad-txns-nonfinal");
4649  }
4650 
4651  // Enforce block.nVersion=2 rule that the coinbase starts with serialized block height
4652  // if 750 of the last 1,000 blocks are version 2 or greater (51/100 if testnet):
4653  if (block.nVersion >= 2 &&
4654  CBlockIndex::IsSuperMajority(2, pindexPrev, Params().EnforceBlockUpgradeMajority())) {
4655  CScript expect = CScript() << nHeight;
4656  if (block.vtx[0].vin[0].scriptSig.size() < expect.size() ||
4657  !std::equal(expect.begin(), expect.end(), block.vtx[0].vin[0].scriptSig.begin())) {
4658  return state.DoS(100, error("%s : block height mismatch in coinbase", __func__), REJECT_INVALID, "bad-cb-height");
4659  }
4660  }
4661 
4662  return true;
4663 }
4664 
4665 bool AcceptBlockHeader(const CBlock& block, CValidationState& state, CBlockIndex** ppindex)
4666 {
4667  AssertLockHeld(cs_main);
4668  // Check for duplicate
4669  uint256 hash = block.GetHash();
4670  BlockMap::iterator miSelf = mapBlockIndex.find(hash);
4671  CBlockIndex* pindex = NULL;
4672 
4673  // TODO : ENABLE BLOCK CACHE IN SPECIFIC CASES
4674  if (miSelf != mapBlockIndex.end()) {
4675  // Block header is already known.
4676  pindex = miSelf->second;
4677  if (ppindex)
4678  *ppindex = pindex;
4679  if (pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_FAILED_MASK)
4680  return state.Invalid(error("%s : block is marked invalid", __func__), 0, "duplicate");
4681  return true;
4682  }
4683 
4684  if (!CheckBlockHeader(block, state, false)) {
4685  LogPrintf("AcceptBlockHeader(): CheckBlockHeader failed \n");
4686  return false;
4687  }
4688 
4689  // Get prev block index
4690  CBlockIndex* pindexPrev = NULL;
4691  if (hash != Params().HashGenesisBlock()) {
4692  BlockMap::iterator mi = mapBlockIndex.find(block.hashPrevBlock);
4693  if (mi == mapBlockIndex.end())
4694  return state.DoS(0, error("%s : prev block %s not found", __func__, block.hashPrevBlock.ToString().c_str()), 0, "bad-prevblk");
4695  pindexPrev = (*mi).second;
4696  if (pindexPrev->nStatus & BLOCK_FAILED_MASK) {
4697  //If this "invalid" block is an exact match from the checkpoints, then reconsider it
4698  if (pindex && Checkpoints::CheckBlock(pindex->nHeight - 1, block.hashPrevBlock, true)) {
4699  LogPrintf("%s : Reconsidering block %s height %d\n", __func__, pindexPrev->GetBlockHash().GetHex(), pindexPrev->nHeight);
4700  CValidationState statePrev;
4701  ReconsiderBlock(statePrev, pindexPrev);
4702  if (statePrev.IsValid()) {
4703  ActivateBestChain(statePrev);
4704  return true;
4705  }
4706  }
4707 
4708  return state.DoS(100, error("%s : prev block height=%d hash=%s is invalid, unable to add block %s", __func__, pindexPrev->nHeight, block.hashPrevBlock.GetHex(), block.GetHash().GetHex()),
4709  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-prevblk");
4710  }
4711 
4712  }
4713 
4714  if (!ContextualCheckBlockHeader(block, state, pindexPrev))
4715  return false;
4716 
4717  if (pindex == NULL)
4718  pindex = AddToBlockIndex(block);
4719 
4720  if (ppindex)
4721  *ppindex = pindex;
4722 
4723  return true;
4724 }
4725 
4726 bool AcceptBlock(CBlock& block, CValidationState& state, CBlockIndex** ppindex, CDiskBlockPos* dbp, bool fAlreadyCheckedBlock)
4727 {
4728  AssertLockHeld(cs_main);
4729 
4730  CBlockIndex*& pindex = *ppindex;
4731 
4732  // Get prev block index
4733  CBlockIndex* pindexPrev = NULL;
4734  if (block.GetHash() != Params().HashGenesisBlock()) {
4735  BlockMap::iterator mi = mapBlockIndex.find(block.hashPrevBlock);
4736  if (mi == mapBlockIndex.end())
4737  return state.DoS(0, error("%s : prev block %s not found", __func__, block.hashPrevBlock.ToString().c_str()), 0, "bad-prevblk");
4738  pindexPrev = (*mi).second;
4739  if (pindexPrev->nStatus & BLOCK_FAILED_MASK) {
4740  //If this "invalid" block is an exact match from the checkpoints, then reconsider it
4741  if (Checkpoints::CheckBlock(pindexPrev->nHeight, block.hashPrevBlock, true)) {
4742  LogPrintf("%s : Reconsidering block %s height %d\n", __func__, pindexPrev->GetBlockHash().GetHex(), pindexPrev->nHeight);
4743  CValidationState statePrev;
4744  ReconsiderBlock(statePrev, pindexPrev);
4745  if (statePrev.IsValid()) {
4746  ActivateBestChain(statePrev);
4747  return true;
4748  }
4749  }
4750  return state.DoS(100, error("%s : prev block %s is invalid, unable to add block %s", __func__, block.hashPrevBlock.GetHex(), block.GetHash().GetHex()),
4751  REJECT_INVALID, "bad-prevblk");
4752  }
4753  }
4754 
4755  if (block.GetHash() != Params().HashGenesisBlock() && !CheckWork(block, pindexPrev))
4756  return false;
4757 
4758  if (!AcceptBlockHeader(block, state, &pindex))
4759  return false;
4760 
4761  if (pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_HAVE_DATA) {
4762  // TODO: deal better with duplicate blocks.
4763  // return state.DoS(20, error("AcceptBlock() : already have block %d %s", pindex->nHeight, pindex->GetBlockHash().ToString()), REJECT_DUPLICATE, "duplicate");
4764  return true;
4765  }
4766 
4767  if ((!fAlreadyCheckedBlock && !CheckBlock(block, state)) || !ContextualCheckBlock(block, state, pindex->pprev)) {
4768  if (state.IsInvalid() && !state.CorruptionPossible()) {
4769  pindex->nStatus |= BLOCK_FAILED_VALID;
4770  setDirtyBlockIndex.insert(pindex);
4771  }
4772  return false;
4773  }
4774 
4775  int nHeight = pindex->nHeight;
4776 
4777  // Write block to history file
4778  try {
4779  unsigned int nBlockSize = ::GetSerializeSize(block, SER_DISK, CLIENT_VERSION);
4780  CDiskBlockPos blockPos;
4781  if (dbp != NULL)
4782  blockPos = *dbp;
4783  if (!FindBlockPos(state, blockPos, nBlockSize + 8, nHeight, block.GetBlockTime(), dbp != NULL))
4784  return error("AcceptBlock() : FindBlockPos failed");
4785  if (dbp == NULL)
4786  if (!WriteBlockToDisk(block, blockPos))
4787  return state.Abort("Failed to write block");
4788  if (!ReceivedBlockTransactions(block, state, pindex, blockPos))
4789  return error("AcceptBlock() : ReceivedBlockTransactions failed");
4790  } catch (std::runtime_error& e) {
4791  return state.Abort(std::string("System error: ") + e.what());
4792  }
4793 
4794  return true;
4795 }
4796 
4797 bool CBlockIndex::IsSuperMajority(int minVersion, const CBlockIndex* pstart, unsigned int nRequired)
4798 {
4799  unsigned int nToCheck = Params().ToCheckBlockUpgradeMajority();
4800  unsigned int nFound = 0;
4801  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nToCheck && nFound < nRequired && pstart != NULL; i++) {
4802  if (pstart->nVersion >= minVersion)
4803  ++nFound;
4804  pstart = pstart->pprev;
4805  }
4806  return (nFound >= nRequired);
4807 }
4808 
4810 int static inline InvertLowestOne(int n) { return n & (n - 1); }
4811 
4813 int static inline GetSkipHeight(int height)
4814 {
4815  if (height < 2)
4816  return 0;
4817 
4818  // Determine which height to jump back to. Any number strictly lower than height is acceptable,
4819  // but the following expression seems to perform well in simulations (max 110 steps to go back
4820  // up to 2**18 blocks).
4821  return (height & 1) ? InvertLowestOne(InvertLowestOne(height - 1)) + 1 : InvertLowestOne(height);
4822 }
4823 
4824 CBlockIndex* CBlockIndex::GetAncestor(int height)
4825 {
4826  if (height > nHeight || height < 0)
4827  return NULL;
4828 
4829  CBlockIndex* pindexWalk = this;
4830  int heightWalk = nHeight;
4831  while (heightWalk > height) {
4832  int heightSkip = GetSkipHeight(heightWalk);
4833  int heightSkipPrev = GetSkipHeight(heightWalk - 1);
4834  if (heightSkip == height ||
4835  (heightSkip > height && !(heightSkipPrev < heightSkip - 2 && heightSkipPrev >= height))) {
4836  // Only follow pskip if pprev->pskip isn't better than pskip->pprev.
4837  pindexWalk = pindexWalk->pskip;
4838  heightWalk = heightSkip;
4839  } else {
4840  pindexWalk = pindexWalk->pprev;
4841  heightWalk--;
4842  }
4843  }
4844  return pindexWalk;
4845 }
4846 
4847 const CBlockIndex* CBlockIndex::GetAncestor(int height) const
4848 {
4849  return const_cast<CBlockIndex*>(this)->GetAncestor(height);
4850 }
4851 
4852 void CBlockIndex::BuildSkip()
4853 {
4854  if (pprev)
4855  pskip = pprev->GetAncestor(GetSkipHeight(nHeight));
4856 }
4857 
4858 bool ProcessNewBlock(CValidationState& state, CNode* pfrom, CBlock* pblock, CDiskBlockPos* dbp)
4859 {
4860  // Preliminary checks
4861  int64_t nStartTime = GetTimeMillis();
4862  bool checked = CheckBlock(*pblock, state);
4863 
4864  int nMints = 0;
4865  int nSpends = 0;
4866  for (const CTransaction tx : pblock->vtx) {
4867  if (tx.ContainsZerocoins()) {
4868  for (const CTxIn in : tx.vin) {
4869  if (in.scriptSig.IsZerocoinSpend())
4870  nSpends++;
4871  }
4872  for (const CTxOut out : tx.vout) {
4873  if (out.IsZerocoinMint())
4874  nMints++;
4875  }
4876  }
4877  }
4878  if (nMints || nSpends)
4879  LogPrintf("%s : block contains %d zDiv mints and %d zDiv spends\n", __func__, nMints, nSpends);
4880 
4881  // ppcoin: check proof-of-stake
4882  // Limited duplicity on stake: prevents block flood attack
4883  // Duplicate stake allowed only when there is orphan child block
4884  //if (pblock->IsProofOfStake() && setStakeSeen.count(pblock->GetProofOfStake())/* && !mapOrphanBlocksByPrev.count(hash)*/)
4885  // return error("ProcessNewBlock() : duplicate proof-of-stake (%s, %d) for block %s", pblock->GetProofOfStake().first.ToString().c_str(), pblock->GetProofOfStake().second, pblock->GetHash().ToString().c_str());
4886 
4887  // NovaCoin: check proof-of-stake block signature
4888  if (!pblock->CheckBlockSignature())
4889  return error("ProcessNewBlock() : bad proof-of-stake block signature");
4890 
4891  if (pblock->GetHash() != Params().HashGenesisBlock() && pfrom != NULL) {
4892  //if we get this far, check if the prev block is our prev block, if not then request sync and return false
4893  BlockMap::iterator mi = mapBlockIndex.find(pblock->hashPrevBlock);
4894  if (mi == mapBlockIndex.end()) {
4895  pfrom->PushMessage("getblocks", chainActive.GetLocator(), uint256(0));
4896  return false;
4897  }
4898  }
4899 
4900  {
4901  LOCK(cs_main); // Replaces the former TRY_LOCK loop because busy waiting wastes too much resources
4902 
4903  MarkBlockAsReceived (pblock->GetHash ());
4904  if (!checked) {
4905  return error ("%s : CheckBlock FAILED for block %s", __func__, pblock->GetHash().GetHex());
4906  }
4907 
4908  // Store to disk
4909  CBlockIndex* pindex = NULL;
4910  bool ret = AcceptBlock (*pblock, state, &pindex, dbp, checked);
4911  if (pindex && pfrom) {
4912  mapBlockSource[pindex->GetBlockHash ()] = pfrom->GetId ();
4913  }
4914  CheckBlockIndex ();
4915  if (!ret)
4916  return error ("%s : AcceptBlock FAILED", __func__);
4917  }
4918 
4919  if (!ActivateBestChain(state, pblock, checked))
4920  return error("%s : ActivateBestChain failed", __func__);
4921 
4922  if (!fLiteMode) {
4923  if (masternodeSync.RequestedMasternodeAssets > MASTERNODE_SYNC_LIST) {
4924  obfuScationPool.NewBlock();
4925  masternodePayments.ProcessBlock(GetHeight() + 10);
4926  budget.NewBlock();
4927  }
4928  }
4929 
4930  if (pwalletMain) {
4931  // If turned on MultiSend will send a transaction (or more) on the after maturity of a stake
4932  if (pwalletMain->isMultiSendEnabled())
4933  pwalletMain->MultiSend();
4934 
4935  // If turned on Auto Combine will scan wallet for dust to combine
4936  if (pwalletMain->fCombineDust)
4937  pwalletMain->AutoCombineDust();
4938  }
4939 
4940  LogPrintf("%s : ACCEPTED in %ld milliseconds with size=%d\n", __func__, GetTimeMillis() - nStartTime,
4941  pblock->GetSerializeSize(SER_DISK, CLIENT_VERSION));
4942 
4943  return true;
4944 }
4945 
4946 bool TestBlockValidity(CValidationState& state, const CBlock& block, CBlockIndex* const pindexPrev, bool fCheckPOW, bool fCheckMerkleRoot)
4947 {
4948  AssertLockHeld(cs_main);
4949  assert(pindexPrev == chainActive.Tip());
4950 
4951  return true;
4952 
4953  CCoinsViewCache viewNew(pcoinsTip);
4954  CBlockIndex indexDummy(block);
4955  indexDummy.pprev = pindexPrev;
4956  indexDummy.nHeight = pindexPrev->nHeight + 1;
4957 
4958  // NOTE: CheckBlockHeader is called by CheckBlock
4959  if (!ContextualCheckBlockHeader(block, state, pindexPrev))
4960  return false;
4961  if (!CheckBlock(block, state, fCheckPOW, fCheckMerkleRoot))
4962  return false;
4963  if (!ContextualCheckBlock(block, state, pindexPrev))
4964  return false;
4965  if (!ConnectBlock(block, state, &indexDummy, viewNew, true))
4966  return false;
4967  assert(state.IsValid());
4968 
4969  return true;
4970 }
4971 
4972 
4973 bool AbortNode(const std::string& strMessage, const std::string& userMessage)
4974 {
4975  strMiscWarning = strMessage;
4976  LogPrintf("*** %s\n", strMessage);
4977  uiInterface.ThreadSafeMessageBox(
4978  userMessage.empty() ? _("Error: A fatal internal error occured, see debug.log for details") : userMessage,
4979  "", CClientUIInterface::MSG_ERROR);
4980  StartShutdown();
4981  return false;
4982 }
4983 
4984 bool CheckDiskSpace(uint64_t nAdditionalBytes)
4985 {
4986  uint64_t nFreeBytesAvailable = filesystem::space(GetDataDir()).available;
4987 
4988  // Check for nMinDiskSpace bytes (currently 50MB)
4989  if (nFreeBytesAvailable < nMinDiskSpace + nAdditionalBytes)
4990  return AbortNode("Disk space is low!", _("Error: Disk space is low!"));
4991 
4992  return true;
4993 }
4994 
4995 FILE* OpenDiskFile(const CDiskBlockPos& pos, const char* prefix, bool fReadOnly)
4996 {
4997  if (pos.IsNull())
4998  return NULL;
4999  boost::filesystem::path path = GetBlockPosFilename(pos, prefix);
5000  boost::filesystem::create_directories(path.parent_path());
5001  FILE* file = fopen(path.string().c_str(), "rb+");
5002  if (!file && !fReadOnly)
5003  file = fopen(path.string().c_str(), "wb+");
5004  if (!file) {
5005  LogPrintf("Unable to open file %s\n", path.string());
5006  return NULL;
5007  }
5008  if (pos.nPos) {
5009  if (fseek(file, pos.nPos, SEEK_SET)) {
5010  LogPrintf("Unable to seek to position %u of %s\n", pos.nPos, path.string());
5011  fclose(file);
5012  return NULL;
5013  }
5014  }
5015  return file;
5016 }
5017 
5018 FILE* OpenBlockFile(const CDiskBlockPos& pos, bool fReadOnly)
5019 {
5020  return OpenDiskFile(pos, "blk", fReadOnly);
5021 }
5022 
5023 FILE* OpenUndoFile(const CDiskBlockPos& pos, bool fReadOnly)
5024 {
5025  return OpenDiskFile(pos, "rev", fReadOnly);
5026 }
5027 
5028 boost::filesystem::path GetBlockPosFilename(const CDiskBlockPos& pos, const char* prefix)
5029 {
5030  return GetDataDir() / "blocks" / strprintf("%s%05u.dat", prefix, pos.nFile);
5031 }
5032 
5033 CBlockIndex* InsertBlockIndex(uint256 hash)
5034 {
5035  if (hash == 0)
5036  return NULL;
5037 
5038  // Return existing
5039  BlockMap::iterator mi = mapBlockIndex.find(hash);
5040  if (mi != mapBlockIndex.end())
5041  return (*mi).second;
5042 
5043  // Create new
5044  CBlockIndex* pindexNew = new CBlockIndex();
5045  if (!pindexNew)
5046  throw runtime_error("LoadBlockIndex() : new CBlockIndex failed");
5047  mi = mapBlockIndex.insert(make_pair(hash, pindexNew)).first;
5048 
5049  //mark as PoS seen
5050  if (pindexNew->IsProofOfStake())
5051  setStakeSeen.insert(make_pair(pindexNew->prevoutStake, pindexNew->nStakeTime));
5052 
5053  pindexNew->phashBlock = &((*mi).first);
5054 
5055  return pindexNew;
5056 }
5057 
5058 bool static LoadBlockIndexDB(string& strError)
5059 {
5060  if (!pblocktree->LoadBlockIndexGuts())
5061  return false;
5062 
5063  boost::this_thread::interruption_point();
5064 
5065  // Calculate nChainWork
5066  vector<pair<int, CBlockIndex*> > vSortedByHeight;
5067  vSortedByHeight.reserve(mapBlockIndex.size());
5068  for (const PAIRTYPE(uint256, CBlockIndex*) & item : mapBlockIndex) {
5069  CBlockIndex* pindex = item.second;
5070  vSortedByHeight.push_back(make_pair(pindex->nHeight, pindex));
5071  }
5072  sort(vSortedByHeight.begin(), vSortedByHeight.end());
5073  BOOST_FOREACH (const PAIRTYPE(int, CBlockIndex*) & item, vSortedByHeight) {
5074  CBlockIndex* pindex = item.second;
5075  pindex->nChainWork = (pindex->pprev ? pindex->pprev->nChainWork : 0) + GetBlockProof(*pindex);
5076  if (pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_HAVE_DATA) {
5077  if (pindex->pprev) {
5078  if (pindex->pprev->nChainTx) {
5079  pindex->nChainTx = pindex->pprev->nChainTx + pindex->nTx;
5080  } else {
5081  pindex->nChainTx = 0;
5082  mapBlocksUnlinked.insert(std::make_pair(pindex->pprev, pindex));
5083  }
5084  } else {
5085  pindex->nChainTx = pindex->nTx;
5086  }
5087  }
5088  if (pindex->IsValid(BLOCK_VALID_TRANSACTIONS) && (pindex->nChainTx || pindex->pprev == NULL))
5089  setBlockIndexCandidates.insert(pindex);
5090  if (pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_FAILED_MASK && (!pindexBestInvalid || pindex->nChainWork > pindexBestInvalid->nChainWork))
5091  pindexBestInvalid = pindex;
5092  if (pindex->pprev)
5093  pindex->BuildSkip();
5094  if (pindex->IsValid(BLOCK_VALID_TREE) && (pindexBestHeader == NULL || CBlockIndexWorkComparator()(pindexBestHeader, pindex)))
5095  pindexBestHeader = pindex;
5096  }
5097 
5098  // Load block file info
5099  pblocktree->ReadLastBlockFile(nLastBlockFile);
5100  vinfoBlockFile.resize(nLastBlockFile + 1);
5101  LogPrintf("%s: last block file = %i\n", __func__, nLastBlockFile);
5102  for (int nFile = 0; nFile <= nLastBlockFile; nFile++) {
5103  pblocktree->ReadBlockFileInfo(nFile, vinfoBlockFile[nFile]);
5104  }
5105  LogPrintf("%s: last block file info: %s\n", __func__, vinfoBlockFile[nLastBlockFile].ToString());
5106  for (int nFile = nLastBlockFile + 1; true; nFile++) {
5107  CBlockFileInfo info;
5108  if (pblocktree->ReadBlockFileInfo(nFile, info)) {
5109  vinfoBlockFile.push_back(info);
5110  } else {
5111  break;
5112  }
5113  }
5114 
5115  // Check presence of blk files
5116  LogPrintf("Checking all blk files are present...\n");
5117  set<int> setBlkDataFiles;
5118  for (const PAIRTYPE(uint256, CBlockIndex*) & item : mapBlockIndex) {
5119  CBlockIndex* pindex = item.second;
5120  if (pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_HAVE_DATA) {
5121  setBlkDataFiles.insert(pindex->nFile);
5122  }
5123  }
5124  for (std::set<int>::iterator it = setBlkDataFiles.begin(); it != setBlkDataFiles.end(); it++) {
5125  CDiskBlockPos pos(*it, 0);
5126  if (CAutoFile(OpenBlockFile(pos, true), SER_DISK, CLIENT_VERSION).IsNull()) {
5127  return false;
5128  }
5129  }
5130 
5131  //Check if the shutdown procedure was followed on last client exit
5132  bool fLastShutdownWasPrepared = true;
5133  pblocktree->ReadFlag("shutdown", fLastShutdownWasPrepared);
5134  LogPrintf("%s: Last shutdown was prepared: %s\n", __func__, fLastShutdownWasPrepared);
5135 
5136  //Check for inconsistency with block file info and internal state
5137  if (!fLastShutdownWasPrepared && !GetBoolArg("-forcestart", false) && !GetBoolArg("-reindex", false)) {
5138  unsigned int nHeightLastBlockFile = vinfoBlockFile[nLastBlockFile].nHeightLast + 1;
5139  if (vSortedByHeight.size() > nHeightLastBlockFile && pcoinsTip->GetBestBlock() != vSortedByHeight[nHeightLastBlockFile].second->GetBlockHash()) {
5140  //The database is in a state where a block has been accepted and written to disk, but the
5141  //transaction database (pcoinsTip) was not flushed to disk, and is therefore not in sync with
5142  //the block index database.
5143 
5144  if (!mapBlockIndex.count(pcoinsTip->GetBestBlock())) {
5145  strError = "The wallet has been not been closed gracefully, causing the transaction database to be out of sync with the block database";
5146  return false;
5147  }
5148  LogPrintf("%s : pcoinstip synced to block height %d, block index height %d\n", __func__,
5149  mapBlockIndex[pcoinsTip->GetBestBlock()]->nHeight, vSortedByHeight.size());
5150 
5151  //get the index associated with the point in the chain that pcoinsTip is synced to
5152  CBlockIndex *pindexLastMeta = vSortedByHeight[vinfoBlockFile[nLastBlockFile].nHeightLast + 1].second;
5153  CBlockIndex *pindex = vSortedByHeight[0].second;
5154  unsigned int nSortedPos = 0;
5155  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vSortedByHeight.size(); i++) {
5156  nSortedPos = i;
5157  if (vSortedByHeight[i].first == mapBlockIndex[pcoinsTip->GetBestBlock()]->nHeight + 1) {
5158  pindex = vSortedByHeight[i].second;
5159  break;
5160  }
5161  }
5162 
5163  // Start at the last block that was successfully added to the txdb (pcoinsTip) and manually add all transactions that occurred for each block up until
5164  // the best known block from the block index db.
5165  CCoinsViewCache view(pcoinsTip);
5166  while (nSortedPos < vSortedByHeight.size()) {
5167  CBlock block;
5168  if (!ReadBlockFromDisk(block, pindex)) {
5169  strError = "The wallet has been not been closed gracefully and has caused corruption of blocks stored to disk. Data directory is in an unusable state";
5170  return false;
5171  }
5172 
5173  vector<CTxUndo> vtxundo;
5174  vtxundo.reserve(block.vtx.size() - 1);
5175  uint256 hashBlock = block.GetHash();
5176  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < block.vtx.size(); i++) {
5177  CValidationState state;
5178  CTxUndo undoDummy;
5179  if (i > 0)
5180  vtxundo.push_back(CTxUndo());
5181  UpdateCoins(block.vtx[i], state, view, i == 0 ? undoDummy : vtxundo.back(), pindex->nHeight);
5182  view.SetBestBlock(hashBlock);
5183  }
5184 
5185  if(pindex->nHeight >= pindexLastMeta->nHeight)
5186  break;
5187 
5188  pindex = vSortedByHeight[++nSortedPos].second;
5189  }
5190 
5191  // Save the updates to disk
5192  if (!view.Flush() || !pcoinsTip->Flush())
5193  LogPrintf("%s : failed to flush view\n", __func__);
5194 
5195  LogPrintf("%s: Last block properly recorded: #%d %s\n", __func__, pindexLastMeta->nHeight,
5196  pindexLastMeta->GetBlockHash().ToString().c_str());
5197  LogPrintf("%s : pcoinstip=%d %s\n", __func__, mapBlockIndex[pcoinsTip->GetBestBlock()]->nHeight,
5198  pcoinsTip->GetBestBlock().GetHex());
5199  }
5200  }
5201 
5202  // Check whether we need to continue reindexing
5203  bool fReindexing = false;
5204  pblocktree->ReadReindexing(fReindexing);
5205  fReindex |= fReindexing;
5206 
5207  // Check whether we have a transaction index
5208  pblocktree->ReadFlag("txindex", fTxIndex);
5209  LogPrintf("LoadBlockIndexDB(): transaction index %s\n", fTxIndex ? "enabled" : "disabled");
5210 
5211  // If this is written true before the next client init, then we know the shutdown process failed
5212  pblocktree->WriteFlag("shutdown", false);
5213 
5214  // Load pointer to end of best chain
5215  BlockMap::iterator it = mapBlockIndex.find(pcoinsTip->GetBestBlock());
5216  if (it == mapBlockIndex.end())
5217  return true;
5218  chainActive.SetTip(it->second);
5219 
5220  PruneBlockIndexCandidates();
5221 
5222  LogPrintf("LoadBlockIndexDB(): hashBestChain=%s height=%d date=%s progress=%f\n",
5223  chainActive.Tip()->GetBlockHash().ToString(), chainActive.Height(),
5224  DateTimeStrFormat("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", chainActive.Tip()->GetBlockTime()),
5225  Checkpoints::GuessVerificationProgress(chainActive.Tip()));
5226 
5227  return true;
5228 }
5229 
5230 CVerifyDB::CVerifyDB()
5231 {
5232  uiInterface.ShowProgress(_("Verifying blocks..."), 0);
5233 }
5234 
5235 CVerifyDB::~CVerifyDB()
5236 {
5237  uiInterface.ShowProgress("", 100);
5238 }
5239 
5240 bool CVerifyDB::VerifyDB(CCoinsView* coinsview, int nCheckLevel, int nCheckDepth)
5241 {
5242  LOCK(cs_main);
5243  if (chainActive.Tip() == NULL || chainActive.Tip()->pprev == NULL)
5244  return true;
5245 
5246  // Verify blocks in the best chain
5247  if (nCheckDepth <= 0)
5248  nCheckDepth = 1000000000; // suffices until the year 19000
5249  if (nCheckDepth > chainActive.Height())
5250  nCheckDepth = chainActive.Height();
5251  nCheckLevel = std::max(0, std::min(4, nCheckLevel));
5252  LogPrintf("Verifying last %i blocks at level %i\n", nCheckDepth, nCheckLevel);
5253  CCoinsViewCache coins(coinsview);
5254  CBlockIndex* pindexState = chainActive.Tip();
5255  CBlockIndex* pindexFailure = NULL;
5256  int nGoodTransactions = 0;
5257  CValidationState state;
5258  for (CBlockIndex* pindex = chainActive.Tip(); pindex && pindex->pprev; pindex = pindex->pprev) {
5259  boost::this_thread::interruption_point();
5260  uiInterface.ShowProgress(_("Verifying blocks..."), std::max(1, std::min(99, (int)(((double)(chainActive.Height() - pindex->nHeight)) / (double)nCheckDepth * (nCheckLevel >= 4 ? 50 : 100)))));
5261  if (pindex->nHeight < chainActive.Height() - nCheckDepth)
5262  break;
5263  CBlock block;
5264  // check level 0: read from disk
5265  if (!ReadBlockFromDisk(block, pindex))
5266  return error("VerifyDB() : *** ReadBlockFromDisk failed at %d, hash=%s", pindex->nHeight, pindex->GetBlockHash().ToString());
5267  // check level 1: verify block validity
5268  if (nCheckLevel >= 1 && !CheckBlock(block, state))
5269  return error("VerifyDB() : *** found bad block at %d, hash=%s\n", pindex->nHeight, pindex->GetBlockHash().ToString());
5270  // check level 2: verify undo validity
5271  if (nCheckLevel >= 2 && pindex) {
5272  CBlockUndo undo;
5273  CDiskBlockPos pos = pindex->GetUndoPos();
5274  if (!pos.IsNull()) {
5275  if (!undo.ReadFromDisk(pos, pindex->pprev->GetBlockHash()))
5276  return error("VerifyDB() : *** found bad undo data at %d, hash=%s\n", pindex->nHeight, pindex->GetBlockHash().ToString());
5277  }
5278  }
5279  // check level 3: check for inconsistencies during memory-only disconnect of tip blocks
5280  if (nCheckLevel >= 3 && pindex == pindexState && (coins.GetCacheSize() + pcoinsTip->GetCacheSize()) <= nCoinCacheSize) {
5281  bool fClean = true;
5282  if (!DisconnectBlock(block, state, pindex, coins, &fClean))
5283  return error("VerifyDB() : *** irrecoverable inconsistency in block data at %d, hash=%s", pindex->nHeight, pindex->GetBlockHash().ToString());
5284  pindexState = pindex->pprev;
5285  if (!fClean) {
5286  nGoodTransactions = 0;
5287  pindexFailure = pindex;
5288  } else
5289  nGoodTransactions += block.vtx.size();
5290  }
5291  if (ShutdownRequested())
5292  return true;
5293  }
5294  if (pindexFailure)
5295  return error("VerifyDB() : *** coin database inconsistencies found (last %i blocks, %i good transactions before that)\n", chainActive.Height() - pindexFailure->nHeight + 1, nGoodTransactions);
5296 
5297  // check level 4: try reconnecting blocks
5298  if (nCheckLevel >= 4) {
5299  CBlockIndex* pindex = pindexState;
5300  while (pindex != chainActive.Tip()) {
5301  boost::this_thread::interruption_point();
5302  uiInterface.ShowProgress(_("Verifying blocks..."), std::max(1, std::min(99, 100 - (int)(((double)(chainActive.Height() - pindex->nHeight)) / (double)nCheckDepth * 50))));
5303  pindex = chainActive.Next(pindex);
5304  CBlock block;
5305  if (!ReadBlockFromDisk(block, pindex))
5306  return error("VerifyDB() : *** ReadBlockFromDisk failed at %d, hash=%s", pindex->nHeight, pindex->GetBlockHash().ToString());
5307  if (!ConnectBlock(block, state, pindex, coins, false))
5308  return error("VerifyDB() : *** found unconnectable block at %d, hash=%s", pindex->nHeight, pindex->GetBlockHash().ToString());
5309  }
5310  }
5311 
5312  LogPrintf("No coin database inconsistencies in last %i blocks (%i transactions)\n", chainActive.Height() - pindexState->nHeight, nGoodTransactions);
5313 
5314  return true;
5315 }
5316 
5317 void UnloadBlockIndex()
5318 {
5319  mapBlockIndex.clear();
5320  setBlockIndexCandidates.clear();
5321  chainActive.SetTip(NULL);
5322  pindexBestInvalid = NULL;
5323 }
5324 
5325 bool LoadBlockIndex(string& strError)
5326 {
5327  // Load block index from databases
5328  if (!fReindex && !LoadBlockIndexDB(strError))
5329  return false;
5330  return true;
5331 }
5332 
5333 
5334 bool InitBlockIndex()
5335 {
5336  LOCK(cs_main);
5337  // Check whether we're already initialized
5338  if (chainActive.Genesis() != NULL)
5339  return true;
5340 
5341  // Use the provided setting for -txindex in the new database
5342  fTxIndex = GetBoolArg("-txindex", true);
5343  pblocktree->WriteFlag("txindex", fTxIndex);
5344  LogPrintf("Initializing databases...\n");
5345 
5346  // Only add the genesis block if not reindexing (in which case we reuse the one already on disk)
5347  if (!fReindex) {
5348  try {
5349  CBlock& block = const_cast<CBlock&>(Params().GenesisBlock());
5350  // Start new block file
5351  unsigned int nBlockSize = ::GetSerializeSize(block, SER_DISK, CLIENT_VERSION);
5352  CDiskBlockPos blockPos;
5353  CValidationState state;
5354  if (!FindBlockPos(state, blockPos, nBlockSize + 8, 0, block.GetBlockTime()))
5355  return error("LoadBlockIndex() : FindBlockPos failed");
5356  if (!WriteBlockToDisk(block, blockPos))
5357  return error("LoadBlockIndex() : writing genesis block to disk failed");
5358  CBlockIndex* pindex = AddToBlockIndex(block);
5359  if (!ReceivedBlockTransactions(block, state, pindex, blockPos))
5360  return error("LoadBlockIndex() : genesis block not accepted");
5361  if (!ActivateBestChain(state, &block))
5362  return error("LoadBlockIndex() : genesis block cannot be activated");
5363  // Force a chainstate write so that when we VerifyDB in a moment, it doesnt check stale data
5364  return FlushStateToDisk(state, FLUSH_STATE_ALWAYS);
5365  } catch (std::runtime_error& e) {
5366  return error("LoadBlockIndex() : failed to initialize block database: %s", e.what());
5367  }
5368  }
5369 
5370  return true;
5371 }
5372 
5373 
5374 bool LoadExternalBlockFile(FILE* fileIn, CDiskBlockPos* dbp)
5375 {
5376  // Map of disk positions for blocks with unknown parent (only used for reindex)
5377  static std::multimap<uint256, CDiskBlockPos> mapBlocksUnknownParent;
5378  int64_t nStart = GetTimeMillis();
5379 
5380  int nLoaded = 0;
5381  try {
5382  // This takes over fileIn and calls fclose() on it in the CBufferedFile destructor
5383  CBufferedFile blkdat(fileIn, 2 * MAX_BLOCK_SIZE_CURRENT, MAX_BLOCK_SIZE_CURRENT + 8, SER_DISK, CLIENT_VERSION);
5384  uint64_t nRewind = blkdat.GetPos();
5385  while (!blkdat.eof()) {
5386  boost::this_thread::interruption_point();
5387 
5388  blkdat.SetPos(nRewind);
5389  nRewind++; // start one byte further next time, in case of failure
5390  blkdat.SetLimit(); // remove former limit
5391  unsigned int nSize = 0;
5392  try {
5393  // locate a header
5394  unsigned char buf[MESSAGE_START_SIZE];
5395  blkdat.FindByte(Params().MessageStart()[0]);
5396  nRewind = blkdat.GetPos() + 1;
5397  blkdat >> FLATDATA(buf);
5398  if (memcmp(buf, Params().MessageStart(), MESSAGE_START_SIZE))
5399  continue;
5400  // read size
5401  blkdat >> nSize;
5402  if (nSize < 80 || nSize > MAX_BLOCK_SIZE_CURRENT)
5403  continue;
5404  } catch (const std::exception&) {
5405  // no valid block header found; don't complain
5406  break;
5407  }
5408  try {
5409  // read block
5410  uint64_t nBlockPos = blkdat.GetPos();
5411  if (dbp)
5412  dbp->nPos = nBlockPos;
5413  blkdat.SetLimit(nBlockPos + nSize);
5414  blkdat.SetPos(nBlockPos);
5415  CBlock block;
5416  blkdat >> block;
5417  nRewind = blkdat.GetPos();
5418 
5419  // detect out of order blocks, and store them for later
5420  uint256 hash = block.GetHash();
5421  if (hash != Params().HashGenesisBlock() && mapBlockIndex.find(block.hashPrevBlock) == mapBlockIndex.end()) {
5422  LogPrint("reindex", "%s: Out of order block %s, parent %s not known\n", __func__, hash.ToString(),
5423  block.hashPrevBlock.ToString());
5424  if (dbp)
5425  mapBlocksUnknownParent.insert(std::make_pair(block.hashPrevBlock, *dbp));
5426  continue;
5427  }
5428 
5429  // process in case the block isn't known yet
5430  if (mapBlockIndex.count(hash) == 0 || (mapBlockIndex[hash]->nStatus & BLOCK_HAVE_DATA) == 0) {
5431  CValidationState state;
5432  if (ProcessNewBlock(state, NULL, &block, dbp))
5433  nLoaded++;
5434  if (state.IsError())
5435  break;
5436  } else if (hash != Params().HashGenesisBlock() && mapBlockIndex[hash]->nHeight % 1000 == 0) {
5437  LogPrintf("Block Import: already had block %s at height %d\n", hash.ToString(), mapBlockIndex[hash]->nHeight);
5438  }
5439 
5440  // Recursively process earlier encountered successors of this block
5441  deque<uint256> queue;
5442  queue.push_back(hash);
5443  while (!queue.empty()) {
5444  uint256 head = queue.front();
5445  queue.pop_front();
5446  std::pair<std::multimap<uint256, CDiskBlockPos>::iterator, std::multimap<uint256, CDiskBlockPos>::iterator> range = mapBlocksUnknownParent.equal_range(head);
5447  while (range.first != range.second) {
5448  std::multimap<uint256, CDiskBlockPos>::iterator it = range.first;
5449  if (ReadBlockFromDisk(block, it->second)) {
5450  LogPrintf("%s: Processing out of order child %s of %s\n", __func__, block.GetHash().ToString(),
5451  head.ToString());
5452  CValidationState dummy;
5453  if (ProcessNewBlock(dummy, NULL, &block, &it->second)) {
5454  nLoaded++;
5455  queue.push_back(block.GetHash());
5456  }
5457  }
5458  range.first++;
5459  mapBlocksUnknownParent.erase(it);
5460  }
5461  }
5462  } catch (std::exception& e) {
5463  LogPrintf("%s : Deserialize or I/O error - %s", __func__, e.what());
5464  }
5465  }
5466  } catch (std::runtime_error& e) {
5467  AbortNode(std::string("System error: ") + e.what());
5468  }
5469  if (nLoaded > 0)
5470  LogPrintf("Loaded %i blocks from external file in %dms\n", nLoaded, GetTimeMillis() - nStart);
5471  return nLoaded > 0;
5472 }
5473 
5474 void static CheckBlockIndex()
5475 {
5476  if (!fCheckBlockIndex) {
5477  return;
5478  }
5479 
5480  LOCK(cs_main);
5481 
5482  // During a reindex, we read the genesis block and call CheckBlockIndex before ActivateBestChain,
5483  // so we have the genesis block in mapBlockIndex but no active chain. (A few of the tests when
5484  // iterating the block tree require that chainActive has been initialized.)
5485  if (chainActive.Height() < 0) {
5486  assert(mapBlockIndex.size() <= 1);
5487  return;
5488  }
5489 
5490  // Build forward-pointing map of the entire block tree.
5491  std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*> forward;
5492  for (BlockMap::iterator it = mapBlockIndex.begin(); it != mapBlockIndex.end(); it++) {
5493  forward.insert(std::make_pair(it->second->pprev, it->second));
5494  }
5495 
5496  assert(forward.size() == mapBlockIndex.size());
5497 
5498  std::pair<std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator, std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator> rangeGenesis = forward.equal_range(NULL);
5499  CBlockIndex* pindex = rangeGenesis.first->second;
5500  rangeGenesis.first++;
5501  assert(rangeGenesis.first == rangeGenesis.second); // There is only one index entry with parent NULL.
5502 
5503  // Iterate over the entire block tree, using depth-first search.
5504  // Along the way, remember whether there are blocks on the path from genesis
5505  // block being explored which are the first to have certain properties.
5506  size_t nNodes = 0;
5507  int nHeight = 0;
5508  CBlockIndex* pindexFirstInvalid = NULL; // Oldest ancestor of pindex which is invalid.
5509  CBlockIndex* pindexFirstMissing = NULL; // Oldest ancestor of pindex which does not have BLOCK_HAVE_DATA.
5510  CBlockIndex* pindexFirstNotTreeValid = NULL; // Oldest ancestor of pindex which does not have BLOCK_VALID_TREE (regardless of being valid or not).
5511  CBlockIndex* pindexFirstNotChainValid = NULL; // Oldest ancestor of pindex which does not have BLOCK_VALID_CHAIN (regardless of being valid or not).
5512  CBlockIndex* pindexFirstNotScriptsValid = NULL; // Oldest ancestor of pindex which does not have BLOCK_VALID_SCRIPTS (regardless of being valid or not).
5513  while (pindex != NULL) {
5514  nNodes++;
5515  if (pindexFirstInvalid == NULL && pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_FAILED_VALID) pindexFirstInvalid = pindex;
5516  if (pindexFirstMissing == NULL && !(pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_HAVE_DATA)) pindexFirstMissing = pindex;
5517  if (pindex->pprev != NULL && pindexFirstNotTreeValid == NULL && (pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_VALID_MASK) < BLOCK_VALID_TREE) pindexFirstNotTreeValid = pindex;
5518  if (pindex->pprev != NULL && pindexFirstNotChainValid == NULL && (pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_VALID_MASK) < BLOCK_VALID_CHAIN) pindexFirstNotChainValid = pindex;
5519  if (pindex->pprev != NULL && pindexFirstNotScriptsValid == NULL && (pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_VALID_MASK) < BLOCK_VALID_SCRIPTS) pindexFirstNotScriptsValid = pindex;
5520 
5521  // Begin: actual consistency checks.
5522  if (pindex->pprev == NULL) {
5523  // Genesis block checks.
5524  assert(pindex->GetBlockHash() == Params().HashGenesisBlock()); // Genesis block's hash must match.
5525  assert(pindex == chainActive.Genesis()); // The current active chain's genesis block must be this block.
5526  }
5527  // HAVE_DATA is equivalent to VALID_TRANSACTIONS and equivalent to nTx > 0 (we stored the number of transactions in the block)
5528  assert(!(pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_HAVE_DATA) == (pindex->nTx == 0));
5529  assert(((pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_VALID_MASK) >= BLOCK_VALID_TRANSACTIONS) == (pindex->nTx > 0));
5530  if (pindex->nChainTx == 0) assert(pindex->nSequenceId == 0); // nSequenceId can't be set for blocks that aren't linked
5531  // All parents having data is equivalent to all parents being VALID_TRANSACTIONS, which is equivalent to nChainTx being set.
5532  assert((pindexFirstMissing != NULL) == (pindex->nChainTx == 0)); // nChainTx == 0 is used to signal that all parent block's transaction data is available.
5533  assert(pindex->nHeight == nHeight); // nHeight must be consistent.
5534  assert(pindex->pprev == NULL || pindex->nChainWork >= pindex->pprev->nChainWork); // For every block except the genesis block, the chainwork must be larger than the parent's.
5535  assert(nHeight < 2 || (pindex->pskip && (pindex->pskip->nHeight < nHeight))); // The pskip pointer must point back for all but the first 2 blocks.
5536  assert(pindexFirstNotTreeValid == NULL); // All mapBlockIndex entries must at least be TREE valid
5537  if ((pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_VALID_MASK) >= BLOCK_VALID_TREE) assert(pindexFirstNotTreeValid == NULL); // TREE valid implies all parents are TREE valid
5538  if ((pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_VALID_MASK) >= BLOCK_VALID_CHAIN) assert(pindexFirstNotChainValid == NULL); // CHAIN valid implies all parents are CHAIN valid
5539  if ((pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_VALID_MASK) >= BLOCK_VALID_SCRIPTS) assert(pindexFirstNotScriptsValid == NULL); // SCRIPTS valid implies all parents are SCRIPTS valid
5540  if (pindexFirstInvalid == NULL) {
5541  // Checks for not-invalid blocks.
5542  assert((pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_FAILED_MASK) == 0); // The failed mask cannot be set for blocks without invalid parents.
5543  }
5544  if (!CBlockIndexWorkComparator()(pindex, chainActive.Tip()) && pindexFirstMissing == NULL) {
5545  if (pindexFirstInvalid == NULL) { // If this block sorts at least as good as the current tip and is valid, it must be in setBlockIndexCandidates.
5546  assert(setBlockIndexCandidates.count(pindex));
5547  }
5548  } else { // If this block sorts worse than the current tip, it cannot be in setBlockIndexCandidates.
5549  assert(setBlockIndexCandidates.count(pindex) == 0);
5550  }
5551  // Check whether this block is in mapBlocksUnlinked.
5552  std::pair<std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator, std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator> rangeUnlinked = mapBlocksUnlinked.equal_range(pindex->pprev);
5553  bool foundInUnlinked = false;
5554  while (rangeUnlinked.first != rangeUnlinked.second) {
5555  assert(rangeUnlinked.first->first == pindex->pprev);
5556  if (rangeUnlinked.first->second == pindex) {
5557  foundInUnlinked = true;
5558  break;
5559  }
5560  rangeUnlinked.first++;
5561  }
5562  if (pindex->pprev && pindex->nStatus & BLOCK_HAVE_DATA && pindexFirstMissing != NULL) {
5563  if (pindexFirstInvalid == NULL) { // If this block has block data available, some parent doesn't, and has no invalid parents, it must be in mapBlocksUnlinked.
5564  assert(foundInUnlinked);
5565  }
5566  } else { // If this block does not have block data available, or all parents do, it cannot be in mapBlocksUnlinked.
5567  assert(!foundInUnlinked);
5568  }
5569  // assert(pindex->GetBlockHash() == pindex->GetBlockHeader().GetHash()); // Perhaps too slow
5570  // End: actual consistency checks.
5571 
5572  // Try descending into the first subnode.
5573  std::pair<std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator, std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator> range = forward.equal_range(pindex);
5574  if (range.first != range.second) {
5575  // A subnode was found.
5576  pindex = range.first->second;
5577  nHeight++;
5578  continue;
5579  }
5580  // This is a leaf node.
5581  // Move upwards until we reach a node of which we have not yet visited the last child.
5582  while (pindex) {
5583  // We are going to either move to a parent or a sibling of pindex.
5584  // If pindex was the first with a certain property, unset the corresponding variable.
5585  if (pindex == pindexFirstInvalid) pindexFirstInvalid = NULL;
5586  if (pindex == pindexFirstMissing) pindexFirstMissing = NULL;
5587  if (pindex == pindexFirstNotTreeValid) pindexFirstNotTreeValid = NULL;
5588  if (pindex == pindexFirstNotChainValid) pindexFirstNotChainValid = NULL;
5589  if (pindex == pindexFirstNotScriptsValid) pindexFirstNotScriptsValid = NULL;
5590  // Find our parent.
5591  CBlockIndex* pindexPar = pindex->pprev;
5592  // Find which child we just visited.
5593  std::pair<std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator, std::multimap<CBlockIndex*, CBlockIndex*>::iterator> rangePar = forward.equal_range(pindexPar);
5594  while (rangePar.first->second != pindex) {
5595  assert(rangePar.first != rangePar.second); // Our parent must have at least the node we're coming from as child.
5596  rangePar.first++;
5597  }
5598  // Proceed to the next one.
5599  rangePar.first++;
5600  if (rangePar.first != rangePar.second) {
5601  // Move to the sibling.
5602  pindex = rangePar.first->second;
5603  break;
5604  } else {
5605  // Move up further.
5606  pindex = pindexPar;
5607  nHeight--;
5608  continue;
5609  }
5610  }
5611  }
5612 
5613  // Check that we actually traversed the entire map.
5614  assert(nNodes == forward.size());
5615 }
5616 
5618 //
5619 // CAlert
5620 //
5621 
5622 string GetWarnings(string strFor)
5623 {
5624  int nPriority = 0;
5625  string strStatusBar;
5626  string strRPC;
5627 
5628  if (!CLIENT_VERSION_IS_RELEASE)
5629  strStatusBar = _("This is a pre-release test build - use at your own risk - do not use for staking or merchant applications!");
5630 
5631  if (GetBoolArg("-testsafemode", false))
5632  strStatusBar = strRPC = "testsafemode enabled";
5633 
5634  // Misc warnings like out of disk space and clock is wrong
5635  if (strMiscWarning != "") {
5636  nPriority = 1000;
5637  strStatusBar = strMiscWarning;
5638  }
5639 
5640  if (fLargeWorkForkFound) {
5641  nPriority = 2000;
5642  strStatusBar = strRPC = _("Warning: The network does not appear to fully agree! Some miners appear to be experiencing issues.");
5643  } else if (fLargeWorkInvalidChainFound) {
5644  nPriority = 2000;
5645  strStatusBar = strRPC = _("Warning: We do not appear to fully agree with our peers! You may need to upgrade, or other nodes may need to upgrade.");
5646  }
5647 
5648  // Alerts
5649  {
5650  LOCK(cs_mapAlerts);
5651  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(const uint256, CAlert) & item, mapAlerts) {
5652  const CAlert& alert = item.second;
5653  if (alert.AppliesToMe() && alert.nPriority > nPriority) {
5654  nPriority = alert.nPriority;
5655  strStatusBar = alert.strStatusBar;
5656  }
5657  }
5658  }
5659 
5660  if (strFor == "statusbar")
5661  return strStatusBar;
5662  else if (strFor == "rpc")
5663  return strRPC;
5664  assert(!"GetWarnings() : invalid parameter");
5665  return "error";
5666 }
5667 
5668 
5670 //
5671 // Messages
5672 //
5673 
5674 
5675 bool static AlreadyHave(const CInv& inv)
5676 {
5677  switch (inv.type) {
5678  case MSG_TX: {
5679  bool txInMap = false;
5680  txInMap = mempool.exists(inv.hash);
5681  return txInMap || mapOrphanTransactions.count(inv.hash) ||
5682  pcoinsTip->HaveCoins(inv.hash);
5683  }
5684  case MSG_DSTX:
5685  return mapObfuscationBroadcastTxes.count(inv.hash);
5686  case MSG_BLOCK:
5687  return mapBlockIndex.count(inv.hash);
5688  case MSG_TXLOCK_REQUEST:
5689  return mapTxLockReq.count(inv.hash) ||
5690  mapTxLockReqRejected.count(inv.hash);
5691  case MSG_TXLOCK_VOTE:
5692  return mapTxLockVote.count(inv.hash);
5693  case MSG_SPORK:
5694  return mapSporks.count(inv.hash);
5695  case MSG_MASTERNODE_WINNER:
5696  if (masternodePayments.mapMasternodePayeeVotes.count(inv.hash)) {
5697  masternodeSync.AddedMasternodeWinner(inv.hash);
5698  return true;
5699  }
5700  return false;
5701  case MSG_BUDGET_VOTE:
5702  if (budget.mapSeenMasternodeBudgetVotes.count(inv.hash)) {
5703  masternodeSync.AddedBudgetItem(inv.hash);
5704  return true;
5705  }
5706  return false;
5707  case MSG_BUDGET_PROPOSAL:
5708  if (budget.mapSeenMasternodeBudgetProposals.count(inv.hash)) {
5709  masternodeSync.AddedBudgetItem(inv.hash);
5710  return true;
5711  }
5712  return false;
5713  case MSG_BUDGET_FINALIZED_VOTE:
5714  if (budget.mapSeenFinalizedBudgetVotes.count(inv.hash)) {
5715  masternodeSync.AddedBudgetItem(inv.hash);
5716  return true;
5717  }
5718  return false;
5719  case MSG_BUDGET_FINALIZED:
5720  if (budget.mapSeenFinalizedBudgets.count(inv.hash)) {
5721  masternodeSync.AddedBudgetItem(inv.hash);
5722  return true;
5723  }
5724  return false;
5725  case MSG_MASTERNODE_ANNOUNCE:
5726  if (mnodeman.mapSeenMasternodeBroadcast.count(inv.hash)) {
5727  masternodeSync.AddedMasternodeList(inv.hash);
5728  return true;
5729  }
5730  return false;
5731  case MSG_MASTERNODE_PING:
5732  return mnodeman.mapSeenMasternodePing.count(inv.hash);
5733  }
5734  // Don't know what it is, just say we already got one
5735  return true;
5736 }
5737 
5738 
5739 void static ProcessGetData(CNode* pfrom)
5740 {
5741  std::deque<CInv>::iterator it = pfrom->vRecvGetData.begin();
5742 
5743  vector<CInv> vNotFound;
5744 
5745  LOCK(cs_main);
5746 
5747  while (it != pfrom->vRecvGetData.end()) {
5748  // Don't bother if send buffer is too full to respond anyway
5749  if (pfrom->nSendSize >= SendBufferSize())
5750  break;
5751 
5752  const CInv& inv = *it;
5753  {
5754  boost::this_thread::interruption_point();
5755  it++;
5756 
5757  if (inv.type == MSG_BLOCK || inv.type == MSG_FILTERED_BLOCK) {
5758  bool send = false;
5759  BlockMap::iterator mi = mapBlockIndex.find(inv.hash);
5760  if (mi != mapBlockIndex.end()) {
5761  if (chainActive.Contains(mi->second)) {
5762  send = true;
5763  } else {
5764  // To prevent fingerprinting attacks, only send blocks outside of the active
5765  // chain if they are valid, and no more than a max reorg depth than the best header
5766  // chain we know about.
5767  send = mi->second->IsValid(BLOCK_VALID_SCRIPTS) && (pindexBestHeader != NULL) &&
5768  (chainActive.Height() - mi->second->nHeight < Params().MaxReorganizationDepth());
5769  if (!send) {
5770  LogPrintf("ProcessGetData(): ignoring request from peer=%i for old block that isn't in the main chain\n", pfrom->GetId());
5771  }
5772  }
5773  }
5774  // Don't send not-validated blocks
5775  if (send && (mi->second->nStatus & BLOCK_HAVE_DATA)) {
5776  // Send block from disk
5777  CBlock block;
5778  if (!ReadBlockFromDisk(block, (*mi).second))
5779  assert(!"cannot load block from disk");
5780  if (inv.type == MSG_BLOCK)
5781  pfrom->PushMessage("block", block);
5782  else // MSG_FILTERED_BLOCK)
5783  {
5784  LOCK(pfrom->cs_filter);
5785  if (pfrom->pfilter) {
5786  CMerkleBlock merkleBlock(block, *pfrom->pfilter);
5787  pfrom->PushMessage("merkleblock", merkleBlock);
5788  // CMerkleBlock just contains hashes, so also push any transactions in the block the client did not see
5789  // This avoids hurting performance by pointlessly requiring a round-trip
5790  // Note that there is currently no way for a node to request any single transactions we didnt send here -
5791  // they must either disconnect and retry or request the full block.
5792  // Thus, the protocol spec specified allows for us to provide duplicate txn here,
5793  // however we MUST always provide at least what the remote peer needs
5794  typedef std::pair<unsigned int, uint256> PairType;
5795  BOOST_FOREACH (PairType& pair, merkleBlock.vMatchedTxn)
5796  if (!pfrom->setInventoryKnown.count(CInv(MSG_TX, pair.second)))
5797  pfrom->PushMessage("tx", block.vtx[pair.first]);
5798  }
5799  // else
5800  // no response
5801  }
5802 
5803  // Trigger them to send a getblocks request for the next batch of inventory
5804  if (inv.hash == pfrom->hashContinue) {
5805  // Bypass PushInventory, this must send even if redundant,
5806  // and we want it right after the last block so they don't
5807  // wait for other stuff first.
5808  vector<CInv> vInv;
5809  vInv.push_back(CInv(MSG_BLOCK, chainActive.Tip()->GetBlockHash()));
5810  pfrom->PushMessage("inv", vInv);
5811  pfrom->hashContinue = 0;
5812  }
5813  }
5814  } else if (inv.IsKnownType()) {
5815  // Send stream from relay memory
5816  bool pushed = false;
5817  {
5818  LOCK(cs_mapRelay);
5819  map<CInv, CDataStream>::iterator mi = mapRelay.find(inv);
5820  if (mi != mapRelay.end()) {
5821  pfrom->PushMessage(inv.GetCommand(), (*mi).second);
5822  pushed = true;
5823  }
5824  }
5825 
5826  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_TX) {
5827  CTransaction tx;
5828  if (mempool.lookup(inv.hash, tx)) {
5829  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5830  ss.reserve(1000);
5831  ss << tx;
5832  pfrom->PushMessage("tx", ss);
5833  pushed = true;
5834  }
5835  }
5836  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_TXLOCK_VOTE) {
5837  if (mapTxLockVote.count(inv.hash)) {
5838  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5839  ss.reserve(1000);
5840  ss << mapTxLockVote[inv.hash];
5841  pfrom->PushMessage("txlvote", ss);
5842  pushed = true;
5843  }
5844  }
5845  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_TXLOCK_REQUEST) {
5846  if (mapTxLockReq.count(inv.hash)) {
5847  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5848  ss.reserve(1000);
5849  ss << mapTxLockReq[inv.hash];
5850  pfrom->PushMessage("ix", ss);
5851  pushed = true;
5852  }
5853  }
5854  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_SPORK) {
5855  if (mapSporks.count(inv.hash)) {
5856  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5857  ss.reserve(1000);
5858  ss << mapSporks[inv.hash];
5859  pfrom->PushMessage("spork", ss);
5860  pushed = true;
5861  }
5862  }
5863  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_MASTERNODE_WINNER) {
5864  if (masternodePayments.mapMasternodePayeeVotes.count(inv.hash)) {
5865  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5866  ss.reserve(1000);
5867  ss << masternodePayments.mapMasternodePayeeVotes[inv.hash];
5868  pfrom->PushMessage("mnw", ss);
5869  pushed = true;
5870  }
5871  }
5872  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_BUDGET_VOTE) {
5873  if (budget.mapSeenMasternodeBudgetVotes.count(inv.hash)) {
5874  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5875  ss.reserve(1000);
5876  ss << budget.mapSeenMasternodeBudgetVotes[inv.hash];
5877  pfrom->PushMessage("mvote", ss);
5878  pushed = true;
5879  }
5880  }
5881 
5882  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_BUDGET_PROPOSAL) {
5883  if (budget.mapSeenMasternodeBudgetProposals.count(inv.hash)) {
5884  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5885  ss.reserve(1000);
5886  ss << budget.mapSeenMasternodeBudgetProposals[inv.hash];
5887  pfrom->PushMessage("mprop", ss);
5888  pushed = true;
5889  }
5890  }
5891 
5892  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_BUDGET_FINALIZED_VOTE) {
5893  if (budget.mapSeenFinalizedBudgetVotes.count(inv.hash)) {
5894  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5895  ss.reserve(1000);
5896  ss << budget.mapSeenFinalizedBudgetVotes[inv.hash];
5897  pfrom->PushMessage("fbvote", ss);
5898  pushed = true;
5899  }
5900  }
5901 
5902  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_BUDGET_FINALIZED) {
5903  if (budget.mapSeenFinalizedBudgets.count(inv.hash)) {
5904  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5905  ss.reserve(1000);
5906  ss << budget.mapSeenFinalizedBudgets[inv.hash];
5907  pfrom->PushMessage("fbs", ss);
5908  pushed = true;
5909  }
5910  }
5911 
5912  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_MASTERNODE_ANNOUNCE) {
5913  if (mnodeman.mapSeenMasternodeBroadcast.count(inv.hash)) {
5914  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5915  ss.reserve(1000);
5916  ss << mnodeman.mapSeenMasternodeBroadcast[inv.hash];
5917  pfrom->PushMessage("mnb", ss);
5918  pushed = true;
5919  }
5920  }
5921 
5922  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_MASTERNODE_PING) {
5923  if (mnodeman.mapSeenMasternodePing.count(inv.hash)) {
5924  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5925  ss.reserve(1000);
5926  ss << mnodeman.mapSeenMasternodePing[inv.hash];
5927  pfrom->PushMessage("mnp", ss);
5928  pushed = true;
5929  }
5930  }
5931 
5932  if (!pushed && inv.type == MSG_DSTX) {
5933  if (mapObfuscationBroadcastTxes.count(inv.hash)) {
5934  CDataStream ss(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
5935  ss.reserve(1000);
5936  ss << mapObfuscationBroadcastTxes[inv.hash].tx << mapObfuscationBroadcastTxes[inv.hash].vin << mapObfuscationBroadcastTxes[inv.hash].vchSig << mapObfuscationBroadcastTxes[inv.hash].sigTime;
5937 
5938  pfrom->PushMessage("dstx", ss);
5939  pushed = true;
5940  }
5941  }
5942 
5943 
5944  if (!pushed) {
5945  vNotFound.push_back(inv);
5946  }
5947  }
5948 
5949  // Track requests for our stuff.
5950  g_signals.Inventory(inv.hash);
5951 
5952  if (inv.type == MSG_BLOCK || inv.type == MSG_FILTERED_BLOCK)
5953  break;
5954  }
5955  }
5956 
5957  pfrom->vRecvGetData.erase(pfrom->vRecvGetData.begin(), it);
5958 
5959  if (!vNotFound.empty()) {
5960  // Let the peer know that we didn't find what it asked for, so it doesn't
5961  // have to wait around forever. Currently only SPV clients actually care
5962  // about this message: it's needed when they are recursively walking the
5963  // dependencies of relevant unconfirmed transactions. SPV clients want to
5964  // do that because they want to know about (and store and rebroadcast and
5965  // risk analyze) the dependencies of transactions relevant to them, without
5966  // having to download the entire memory pool.
5967  pfrom->PushMessage("notfound", vNotFound);
5968  }
5969 }
5970 
5971 bool fRequestedSporksIDB = false;
5972 bool static ProcessMessage(CNode* pfrom, string strCommand, CDataStream& vRecv, int64_t nTimeReceived)
5973 {
5974  RandAddSeedPerfmon();
5975  if (fDebug)
5976  LogPrintf("received: %s (%u bytes) peer=%d\n", SanitizeString(strCommand), vRecv.size(), pfrom->id);
5977  if (mapArgs.count("-dropmessagestest") && GetRand(atoi(mapArgs["-dropmessagestest"])) == 0) {
5978  LogPrintf("dropmessagestest DROPPING RECV MESSAGE\n");
5979  return true;
5980  }
5981 
5982  if (strCommand == "version") {
5983  // Each connection can only send one version message
5984  if (pfrom->nVersion != 0) {
5985  pfrom->PushMessage("reject", strCommand, REJECT_DUPLICATE, string("Duplicate version message"));
5986  Misbehaving(pfrom->GetId(), 1);
5987  return false;
5988  }
5989 
5990  // DIVI: We use certain sporks during IBD, so check to see if they are
5991  // available. If not, ask the first peer connected for them.
5992  bool fMissingSporks = !pSporkDB->SporkExists(SPORK_14_NEW_PROTOCOL_ENFORCEMENT) &&
5993  !pSporkDB->SporkExists(SPORK_15_NEW_PROTOCOL_ENFORCEMENT_2) &&
5994  !pSporkDB->SporkExists(SPORK_16_ZEROCOIN_MAINTENANCE_MODE);
5995 
5996  if (fMissingSporks || !fRequestedSporksIDB){
5997  LogPrintf("asking peer for sporks\n");
5998  pfrom->PushMessage("getsporks");
5999  fRequestedSporksIDB = true;
6000  }
6001 
6002  int64_t nTime;
6003  CAddress addrMe;
6004  CAddress addrFrom;
6005  uint64_t nNonce = 1;
6006  vRecv >> pfrom->nVersion >> pfrom->nServices >> nTime >> addrMe;
6007  if (pfrom->DisconnectOldProtocol(ActiveProtocol(), strCommand))
6008  return false;
6009 
6010  if (pfrom->nVersion == 10300)
6011  pfrom->nVersion = 300;
6012  if (!vRecv.empty())
6013  vRecv >> addrFrom >> nNonce;
6014  if (!vRecv.empty()) {
6015  vRecv >> LIMITED_STRING(pfrom->strSubVer, 256);
6016  pfrom->cleanSubVer = SanitizeString(pfrom->strSubVer);
6017  }
6018  if (!vRecv.empty())
6019  vRecv >> pfrom->nStartingHeight;
6020  if (!vRecv.empty())
6021  vRecv >> pfrom->fRelayTxes; // set to true after we get the first filter* message
6022  else
6023  pfrom->fRelayTxes = true;
6024 
6025  // Disconnect if we connected to ourself
6026  if (nNonce == nLocalHostNonce && nNonce > 1) {
6027  LogPrintf("connected to self at %s, disconnecting\n", pfrom->addr.ToString());
6028  pfrom->fDisconnect = true;
6029  return true;
6030  }
6031 
6032  pfrom->addrLocal = addrMe;
6033  if (pfrom->fInbound && addrMe.IsRoutable()) {
6034  SeenLocal(addrMe);
6035  }
6036 
6037  // Be shy and don't send version until we hear
6038  if (pfrom->fInbound)
6039  pfrom->PushVersion();
6040 
6041  pfrom->fClient = !(pfrom->nServices & NODE_NETWORK);
6042 
6043  // Potentially mark this peer as a preferred download peer.
6044  UpdatePreferredDownload(pfrom, State(pfrom->GetId()));
6045 
6046  // Change version
6047  pfrom->PushMessage("verack");
6048  pfrom->ssSend.SetVersion(min(pfrom->nVersion, PROTOCOL_VERSION));
6049 
6050  if (!pfrom->fInbound) {
6051  // Advertise our address
6052  if (fListen && !IsInitialBlockDownload()) {
6053  CAddress addr = GetLocalAddress(&pfrom->addr);
6054  if (addr.IsRoutable()) {
6055  LogPrintf("ProcessMessages: advertizing address %s\n", addr.ToString());
6056  pfrom->PushAddress(addr);
6057  } else if (IsPeerAddrLocalGood(pfrom)) {
6058  addr.SetIP(pfrom->addrLocal);
6059  LogPrintf("ProcessMessages: advertizing address %s\n", addr.ToString());
6060  pfrom->PushAddress(addr);
6061  }
6062  }
6063 
6064  // Get recent addresses
6065  if (pfrom->fOneShot || pfrom->nVersion >= CADDR_TIME_VERSION || addrman.size() < 1000) {
6066  pfrom->PushMessage("getaddr");
6067  pfrom->fGetAddr = true;
6068  }
6069  addrman.Good(pfrom->addr);
6070  } else {
6071  if (((CNetAddr)pfrom->addr) == (CNetAddr)addrFrom) {
6072  addrman.Add(addrFrom, addrFrom);
6073  addrman.Good(addrFrom);
6074  }
6075  }
6076 
6077  // Relay alerts
6078  {
6079  LOCK(cs_mapAlerts);
6080  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(const uint256, CAlert) & item, mapAlerts)
6081  item.second.RelayTo(pfrom);
6082  }
6083 
6084  pfrom->fSuccessfullyConnected = true;
6085 
6086  string remoteAddr;
6087  if (fLogIPs)
6088  remoteAddr = ", peeraddr=" + pfrom->addr.ToString();
6089 
6090  LogPrintf("receive version message: %s: version %d, blocks=%d, us=%s, peer=%d%s\n",
6091  pfrom->cleanSubVer, pfrom->nVersion,
6092  pfrom->nStartingHeight, addrMe.ToString(), pfrom->id,
6093  remoteAddr);
6094 
6095  AddTimeData(pfrom->addr, nTime);
6096  }
6097 
6098
